name: Okteta
description: Okteta is a hexadecimal editor. Numerical values and characters are displayed in two columns after opened the file. You can edit and operate in the columns of numerical values and characters.

en_US.description: Okteta is a hexadecimal editor. Numerical values and characters are displayed in two columns after opened the file. You can edit and operate in the columns of numerical values and characters.
en_US.name: Okteta

zh_CN.description: Okteta是一款十六进制编辑器，打开文件后数值和字符分别通过两列显示内容。可以在数值和字符列进行编辑和操作。
zh_CN.name: Okteta
